list_variables.description: The SNS subscriptions (endpoints) for this topic.

variables.description: A developer-defined string that can be used to identify this SNS topic.
variables.name: DisplayName

variables.description: A name for the topic. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique                   physical ID and uses that ID for the topic name. For more information, see Name Type.
variables.name: TopicName

variables.description: Returns the name for an Amazon SNS topic.
variables.name: TopicName
